about.mainDescription: I am a web developer from Doboj, Bosnia & Herzegovina, with a passion for crafting digital experiences. Besides of coding, you'll find me enjoying sports, tending to my garden, or relaxing with a good movie.
about.currentJob: Currently working as a Software Developer in <0>ProductDock</0>.
about.technologiesDescription: Although I work as a full-stack developer, I am mainly front-end oriented. I mostly use technologies like React, NextJS and TailwindCSS.

entries.description: –êfter successful boot camp I got full time job offer, where I started my career as a Software Developer.
Attended 3 month boot camp program where I built an internal application with other interns. Tech stack used was Angular, Spring Boot, MySQL.
